title: Firehouse Jams, LLC Recalls Uncured Bacon Marmalade Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: Editor’s note: Details of this recall were updated April 21, 2022 to expand the April 16, 2022 recall to now include all products with production dates prior to April 18, 2022 and best used by dates through April 2024. The affected product bears establishment number...
impacted_products: 10.5-oz. jar containing “Eat This – YUM! – Uncured Bacon Marmalade with Oranges and Balsamic Caramelized Onions” with lot codes 7/23, 11/23, 12/23 and 3/24 with a two-year shelf-life.
